metadata.name: !!Music Mod Callback
metadata.description:
[h1]What is it?[/h1] A complete rewrite of the music system, done purely so it can run callbacks before playing tracks. [b]You should only download this mod if another mod requires it.[/b] (Or if you want the built in revelations music fix)
[h1]What can I do now that I couldn't do before?[/h1] - Stop custom music from resetting every room - Specify different music tracks for any condition the lua api can detect [b]- Use music mods in conjunction with StageAPI. No more music resetting every room in the catacombs.[/b] - Prevent music from playing (this includes jingles, room specific music, whatever)
[h1]Known Bugs[/h1] - Stage music doesn't continue after treasure room jingle
[h1]Compatability[/h1] [b]This mod has built in compatability with:[/b] StageAPI Revelations Ch. 2
This mod is NOT compatible with any mod that contains a [b]modified resources/music.xml[/b] (unless listed above). Raw ogg replacements and music added via [b]content/music.xml[/b] is fine. If you really need to use a resources/music.xml for layers or intros, see the Notes section of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1767191363/1638661595064736511/]the documentation.[/url]
[h1]Documentation[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1767191363/1638661595064736511/]Click here.[/url]
Feel free to comment feature requests or bugs.
